amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Wildfire Suppression Program by $50 million and to increase funding for the Forest Legacy Program by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $50,000,000 from the state and private forestry to the Wildland Fire Management program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hanabusa amendment (A041) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hanabusa amendment (A041) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Ms. Hanabusa.
